description: Surrogate unique identifier for the storage location record.
Datetime the location record was created or last updated, stored in compact yyyymmddHHMMSSmmm format; timezone/source system may vary—confirm with SME.
Identifier of the room or area within a facility where items are stored; may be numeric.
Display label or category for the room field; appears constant in data; likely used for UI or reporting—confirm with SME.
Bin identifier specifying the smallest storage slot within a shelf or aisle.
Shelf code identifying the vertical or horizontal segment within a storage area.
Row identifier within the area (e.g., numbered row or boundary like a wall); naming suggests 'row'—confirm with SME.
Aisle or zone code identifying the corridor or section where the storage location resides (including outdoor/yard areas).
Free-text description of the storage location or directions for finding it.
Key from the source/legacy system used to trace the original record during migration and reconciliation.
Name of the source/legacy table from which this record originated.
